chef.title: The Chef
chef.subtitle: Michele Farnesi
chef.description: Born in Tuscany, Michele Farnesi grew up between the kitchens of his two grandmothers. One taught him the art of fresh pasta, the other the art of slow-cooked dishes. This dual heritage feeds his generous and authentic cuisine.
chef.quote: Cooking is the love you put into every dish.

menu.title: The Menu
menu.subtitle: Seasonal cuisine
menu.description: Our menu evolves with the seasons, showcasing the finest Italian products. From antipasti to desserts, each dish tells a story of tradition and passion.

wines.title: Wines
wines.subtitle: Selection
wines.description: A carefully curated cellar of natural and biodynamic Italian wines, selected from independent winemakers we know personally.
